rows.label: qst720202_msg0001
rows.name:
Tell me. You finally found the
uninhabited Divine Beast?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0002
rows.name:
That's right. Made it there without
a scratch.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0003
rows.name:
The map, the bard's song, the elder's
legend... It was all true.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0004
rows.name:
Bah... I wish you could have had
some of that fun AFTER you bonded
with me... No fair!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0005
rows.name:
Of course back then, I had no idea that
I'd be the Driver of the Holy Grail someday.
Not a clue.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0006
rows.name:
And I also had no idea that I'd end up
with a Blade who was so hungry for
experience.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0007
rows.name:
I mean, I prefer it when you have
something interesting to say...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0008
rows.name: I choose to take that as a compliment.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, sure... It was hardly boring,
discovering that legendary
uninhabited Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0010
rows.name: The natives gave us a fine chase.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0011
rows.name:
Natives? I thought you said it was
uninhabited?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, to be precise, we didn't meet any
humans there.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0013
rows.name:
Just some monsters, of the Arachno,
Antol, and Skeeter variety.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0014
rows.name: Cool!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0015
rows.name:
And they were pretty huge specimens,
too. We must have looked like extra
tempting appetizers to them.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0016
rows.name:
There were really quite a lot of them.
We were lucky to get off the Divine Beast in
one piece.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0017
rows.name:
Ah! A fine recompense for an
adventurer's heart!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0018
rows.name:
So your plans to build a holiday villa
there came to nothing. It's more than
a little tragic.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0019
rows.name:
Well, I mean... That wasn't the primary
aim...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0020
rows.name:
Perhaps I didn't get a material reward.
But I certainly got a spiritual reward.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0021
rows.name:
Things didn't work out quite so well
for my "playmates" though.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0022
rows.name: How so...?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0023
rows.name:
It was a kind of paradise for insects.
But I heard later that it was laid to
waste by someone or other.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0024
rows.name: The ways of humans are often cruel...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0025
rows.name:
What's done is done. It was a time of
war, and they had to find a place for
some refugees.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0026
rows.name:
But the monsters couldn't have grasped
that. They probably just saw arrogant
humans wrecking their home.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0027
rows.name:
Ah! The telling of it falls hard upon my
ears...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0028
rows.name: Your Majesty! Forgive my interruption...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0029
rows.name:
But this appears to be the location
mentioned in the report.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0030
rows.name: Ah! So we're here already?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0031
rows.name:
The journey passed as the blinking of
an eye, thanks to Adel's enchanting
tales!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0032
rows.name:
If your servant's humble recounting was
able to relieve your Imperial tedium,
truly the most blessed of men am I!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0033
rows.name:
Oh, I do wish you'd cut it out, Adel.
I am not your better, and you should
know it.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0034
rows.name:
I wouldn't be so sure of that,
Hugo, old friend...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0035
rows.name:
Now then, Hikari... I'd really like to get
your opinion on this. As the Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0037
rows.name:
I hate to be the bearer of bad news,
but this isn't Metsu's handiwork.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0038
rows.name:
How did you come to that conclusion,
Hikari?

rows.label: qst720202_msg0039
rows.name:
Metsu's attacks would have melted the
earth and turned it into glass.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0040
rows.name:
But whatever did this only scorched
the grass. It can't have been such a
high temperature.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0041
rows.name:
That's a very wise deduction. We're
lucky to have you for an ally.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0042
rows.name:
I offer my apologies to you all
for leading you to this disappointing
conclusion.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0043
rows.name:
Nay, Wadatsumi. We could not have
known without investigation.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0044
rows.name:
With each possibility we discard,
we move all the closer to our goal.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0045
rows.name: ...Everyone. Look there!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0046
rows.name: It's a big one...

rows.label: qst720202_msg0047
rows.name: Indeed. We cannot let it run riot.

rows.label: qst720202_msg0048
rows.name:
Just think of the damage it could do if
it got to Lasqam Cove, or a settlement!

rows.label: qst720202_msg0049
rows.name: Everyone! Get to it!
